topic.title: Free domain registrar
topic.body: Freenom seems to respond to any domains as unavailable. Does somebody know a free domain registrar like Freenom?

1579301889_1A8k2FFyono2dUQWKaRzsRvbXguVu.body: Does somebody know how to avoid legal issues like Tor exit nodes?

> [filips](#comment_419_1LFu1BTScmY82HHtg3TY2jAuSrCYNsQWEY): For https://z.hex3.cf: "Error 502: Bad gateway" [...]

They still have been offline yet.

1579475766_1KMFhezc9fqBCbWg8xbu6HimdG5nM.body: Is there any way to publish website from CLI? I need to update contents periodically.

1580286291_1A3qSnQnxgCacYFaCnsqQcKA1yzMj.body:
> [robione](#comment_448_1DoVPxFrQCDb3grC8Nsn6aACed9o2oiumX): dot.tk

Unfortunately, dot.tk seem to use the same registration system.

> [robione](#comment_449_1DoVPxFrQCDb3grC8Nsn6aACed9o2oiumX): check your adblocker or JS, it definitely has free domains as I just found a few. It works.

It does not work for me. Freshening browser, using another IP address, changing User-Agent can't resolve an issue. Maybe my whole IP addresses have been restricted?
